bug.summary: Disable Istio Authorization in kfctl-k8s-istio config
bug.description:
/kind bug What steps did you take and what happened: When we setup kubeflow using kfctl-k8s-istio (<denchmark-link:https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/master/bootstrap/config/kfctl_k8s_istio.yaml>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/master/bootstrap/config/kfctl_k8s_istio.yaml</denchmark-link> ). Authorization is enabled, which means the user can not access his/her own notebook. As I know, authorization should be disabled for this config. What did you expect to happen: User should be able to access his own notebook. ClusterRbacConfig should be OFF Environment:
Kubeflow version: (version number can be found at the bottom left corner of the Kubeflow dashboard): 0.6.1 kfctl version: (use kfctl version): v0.6.1-rc.2-1-g3a37cbc6 Kubernetes platform: (e.g. minikube) aws Kubernetes version: (use kubectl version):1.13.7 OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release): darwin
